description: This trap signifies that an application test has been initiated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::diagApplTestStart RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestId i 9999 PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestType o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: A unique ID to identify each application test.
variables.name: PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestId

description: This object defines the application test type.
variables.name: PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestType

description: This trap signifies that a diagnostic test has been initiated.
This object identifies the current invocation of the
interface's test.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifTestId

description: This trap signifies that an application test has completed.
This trap compliments the diagApplTestStart trap.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::diagApplTestStop RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestId i 9999 PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestType o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestStatus i 1

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: A unique ID to identify each application test.
variables.name: PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestId

description: This object defines the application test type.
variables.name: PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestType

description: This object shows the current status of an application test.
none - indicates waiting for test parameters.
inProgress - indicates the test is in process.
success - indicates the test is completed.
failed - indicates the test is failed.
abort - indicates the test was aborted
variables.name: PDN-DIAGNOSTICS-MIB::applTestStatus

description: This trap signifies that a diagnostic test has completed.
This trap compliments the diagIfTestStart trap
This object identifies the current invocation of the
interface's test.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifTestId
